name: The Dive (demo)
description:
"There's nothing to be ashamed of, Jessica. Remember, not only can you do this--you're the only one who can do this."

Space marine Jessica Ramos wears a special combat suit representing the outer limits of humanity's technological and ethical exploration. Deployed to the surface of Duat, a distant planet orbiting a black hole sun, Jessica undertakes a shadowy mission for her military handlers, descending into the belly of an abandoned, eldritch structure of stone. Her psyche patched back together by hand after years of struggling with mental illness, Jessica will find the corridors of the structure tugging at threads of stowed-away memories and questioning her ability to complete the mission.

An atmospheric sci-fi text adventure with branching choices and relationships. Music by AUTOTECTONIC.

For fans of Metroid, Aliens, Mass Effect, The Light Brigade and Ammonite.

This game is currently a demo intended for playtesting and early feedback. Please direct all comments here or to my twitter page at @briewoodfiction.

I will not charge for the demo but if you wish to contribute to the game's development please hit up my ko-fi. Thanks!
